scripts.db:migrate: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile tools run --rm liquibase update
scripts.db:rollback: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile tools run --rm liquibase rollback-count 1
scripts.db:status: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile tools run --rm liquibase status
scripts.db:generate-changelog: docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile tools run --rm liquibase generate-changelog --changelog-file=db/changelog/changes/auto-generated-changelog.xml
